message: I'm planning on sprinting on Mercurial at PyCon… Is anyone else going to be there?

I'm hoping to do some informal sprinting during the conference days in the evening. I'm not sure there's enough of us to organize a sprint for the sprint days. I leave Tuesday evening, but I might be able to organize things for Sunday to Tuesday afternoon.
Cool. If there's enough interest, I could carry it on after that.
OK, I've put us down on the sprints page: http://us.pycon.org/2011/sprints/projects/
That said, try not to steal too much from the GSoC page!
If you're looking for ideas on what to work on, these two wiki pages are good starting points: http://mercurial.selenic.com/wiki/SummerOfCode/Ideas2011 http://mercurial.selenic.com/wiki/1.7sprint
